column5: Test material in all weather conditions
Install air intake and exhaust manifolds
Connect engine to fuel tanks and air intake
Test Fuel Injection and Flow rate
Create electrical diagram for all on-board systems
Install video cameras and infrared sensors
Install transceivers for data uplink and downlink
Program controller for propulsion and mechanical systems
Test microprocessor communication with UAV systems
Test UAV data uplink and downlink with remote pilot
Develop user interface that is intuitive to USCG pilots
Develop control scheme for required aircraft maneuvers
Build realistic virtual environment for the simulator
Implement either virtual or live user interface
Test effectiveness of user interface and control scheme
Implement several scenarios to test boundary conditions for the UAV
Validate UAV simulator with real-life flight tests
Create mock scenarios to test Search and Rescue capabilities
Determine scoring of various systems based on USCG requirements
Schedule rework operations on parts that fail scoring
